overview: The summer heat has arrived yet again and as with every year Private is back to remind you just what it can bring. Bikinis, tight tops, miniskirts & woman may be beautiful all year round but it s never more true than in the summer! See that girl selling ice cream on the beach? That s Liya Silver. And those two lifeguards? It's the twins Silvia and Eveline Dellai ready to save the day with an anal threesome. Who's the roller girl? That's Angelika Grays and with that body she won't be short of offers! Summer wouldn't be complete without a MILF too, with the horny cougar Julia Pink finding a latin lover and getting up to no good on the beach. And finally the sexy duo of Anita Bellini and Silvia Dellai meet a Cuban on vacation in Formentera & and what happens in Formentera stays in Formentera & and in Private!
title: Sea, Sex And Sun
